imprint: "JAmstelrodami [Amsterdam]: gortseokh, eu tsachiukh Thomasou srbaphajl episkoposi Srboj Chačin, 1696"
title: Girkh Thomaji Khemphacuoj jaghags hamaheteumann Khristosi thargmaneceal 'i Johannise joloveracht vardapete Kostandinoupolsecuoj; 'i chndroj Džoughajeci chodžaj Sahrati orduoj paron Khasparin
author: Thomas, à Kempis, 1380-1471
